dataManagerNameParameter.description: The name of the DataManager Resource within the specified resource group. DataManager names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use any alphanumeric and underscore only
dataManagerNameParameter.name: dataManagerName

display.description:
Gets or sets Display information
Contains the localized display information for this particular operation/action

name.description: Gets or Sets Name of the operations

origin.description:
Gets or sets Origin
The intended executor of the operation; governs the display of the operation in the RBAC UX and the audit logs UX.
Default value is “user,system”

properties.description:
Gets or sets Properties
Reserved for future use

AvailableProviderOperationDisplay.description:
Contains the localized display information for this particular operation / action. 
These value will be used by several clients for 
(1) custom role definitions for RBAC; 
(2) complex query filters for the event service; and (3) audit history / records for management operations.

description.description:
Gets or sets Description
The localized friendly description for the operation, as it should be shown to the user. 
It should be thorough, yet concise – it will be used in tool tips and detailed views.

operation.description:
Gets or sets Operation
The localized friendly name for the operation, as it should be shown to the user. 
It should be concise (to fit in drop downs) but clear (i.e. self-documenting). It should use Title Casing and include the entity/resource to which it applies.

provider.description:
Gets or sets Provider
The localized friendly form of the resource provider name – it is expected to also include the publisher/company responsible. 
It should use Title Casing and begin with “Microsoft” for 1st party services.

resource.description:
Gets or sets Resource
The localized friendly form of the resource type related to this action/operation – it should match the public documentation for the resource provider. 
It should use Title Casing – for examples, please refer to the “name” section.

AvailableProviderOperations.description: Class for set of operations used for discovery of available provider operations.

nextLink.description: Link for the next set of operations.

algorithm.description: The encryption algorithm used to encrypt data.

keyIdentifier.description: The identifier to the data service input object which this secret corresponds to.

keyValue.description: It contains the encrypted customer secret.

nextLink.description: Link for the next set of data stores.

tags.description:
The list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource
(across resource groups).

nextLink.description: Link for the next set of data services.

supportedDataSinkTypes.description: Supported data store types which can be used as a sink.

supportedDataSourceTypes.description: Supported data store types which can be used as a source.

DataStoreFilter.description: Contains the information about the filters for the DataStore.

nextLink.description: Link for the next set of data stores.

DataStoreProperties.description: Data Store for sources and sinks

customerSecrets.description: List of customer secrets containing a key identifier and key value. The key identifier is a way for the specific data source to understand the key. Value contains customer secret encrypted by the encryptionKeys.

dataStoreTypeId.description: The arm id of the data store type.

extendedProperties.description: A generic json used differently by each data source type.

repositoryId.description: Arm Id for the manager resource to which the data source is associated. This is optional.

nextLink.description: Link for the next set of data store types.

repositoryType.description: Arm type for the manager resource to which the data source type is associated. This is optional.

state.description: State of the data store type.

supportedDataServicesAsSink.description: Supported data services where it can be used as a sink.

supportedDataServicesAsSource.description: Supported data services where it can be used as a source.

DmsBaseObject.description: Base class for all objects under DataManager Service

Error.description: Top level error for the job.

code.description: Error code that can be used to programmatically identify the error.

message.description: Describes the error in detail and provides debugging information.

exceptionMessage.description: Contains the non localized exception message

endTime.description: Time at which the job ended in UTC ISO 8601 format.

error.description: Top level error for the job.

startTime.description: Time at which the job was started in UTC ISO 8601 format.

JobDefinitionFilter.description: Contains the supported job definition filters.

dataSource.description: The data source associated with the job definition

lastModified.description: The last modified date time of the data source.

state.description: The state of the job definition.

nextLink.description: Link for the next set of job definitions.

customerSecrets.description: List of customer secrets containing a key identifier and key value. The key identifier is a way for the specific data source to understand the key. Value contains customer secret encrypted by the encryptionKeys.

dataServiceInput.description: A generic json used differently by each data service type.

dataSinkId.description: Data Sink Id associated to the job definition.

dataSourceId.description: Data Source Id associated to the job definition.

lastModifiedTime.description: Last modified time of the job definition.

runLocation.description: This is the preferred geo location for the job to run.

schedules.description: Schedule for running the job definition

userConfirmation.description: Enum to detect if user confirmation is required. If not passed will default to NotRequired.

errorDetails.description: Error details for failure. This is optional.

itemDetailsLink.description: Item Details Link to download files or see details

jobDefinition.description: JobDefinition at the time of the run

jobStages.description: List of stages that ran in the job

JobFilter.description: Contains the information about the filters for the job.

startTime.description: The start time of the job.

nextLink.description: Link for the next set of jobs.

bytesProcessed.description: Number of bytes processed by the job as of now.

dataSinkName.description: Name of the data sink on which the job was triggered.

dataSourceName.description: Name of the data source on which the job was triggered.

details.description: Details of a job run. This field will only be sent for expand details filter.

isCancellable.description: Describes whether the job is cancellable.

itemsProcessed.description: Number of items processed by the job as of now

totalBytesToProcess.description: Number of bytes to be processed by the job in total.

totalItemsToProcess.description: Number of items to be processed by the job in total

errorDetails.description: Error details for the stage. This is optional

encryptionChunkSizeInBytes.description: The maximum byte size that can be encrypted by the key. For a key size larger than the size, break into chunks and encrypt each chunk, append each encrypted chunk with : to mark the end of the chunk.

nextLink.description: Link for the next set of public keys.

dataServiceLevel1Key.description: Level one public key for encryption

dataServiceLevel2Key.description: Level two public key for encryption

tags.description:
The list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource
(across resource groups).

location.description:
The location of the resource. This will be one of the supported and registered Azure Geo Regions (e.g. West US, East
US, Southeast Asia, etc.). The geo region of a resource cannot be changed once it is created, but if an identical geo
region is specified on update the request will succeed.

customerSecrets.description: List of customer secrets containing a key identifier and key value. The key identifier is a way for the specific data source to understand the key. Value contains customer secret encrypted by the encryptionKeys.

dataServiceInput.description: A generic json used differently by each data service type.

userConfirmation.description: Enum to detect if user confirmation is required. If not passed will default to NotRequired.

policyList.description: A list of repetition intervals in ISO 8601 format.

name.description: The sku name. Required for data manager creation, optional for update.

tier.description: The sku tier. This is based on the SKU name.
